title: Halloween skeleton cookies
ingredients: ['300g caster sugar', '225g butter, softened', '2 eggs', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 1/2 teaspoons almond flavouring', '450g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons icing sugar', 'Icing', '125g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons milk, plus more as needed', '2 teaspoons golden syrup, or more as needed', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tube black decorating gel']
